mapper.sql: Project_ID, Project_Name, Project_Purpose, Project_Description, Create_Time, Module_Description, Invite_Code_1, Invite_Code_2, Is_Default, Is_End, Is_Userful, stage
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from Project
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT Project.* FROM `Project_User` LEFT JOIN Project on Project_User.Project_ID=Project.Project_ID WHERE Project_User.User_ID=#{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Project_User.Type=#{1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Project.Is_Userful=1 AND Project.Is_Default = #{2,jdbcType=BIT}
mapper.insert: insert into Project (Project_ID, Project_Name, Project_Purpose, Project_Description, Create_Time, Module_Description, Invite_Code_1, Invite_Code_2, Is_Default, Is_End, Is_Userful, stage) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectPurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{moduleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteCode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isUserful,jdbcType=BIT}, #{stage,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into Project
Project_ID,
Project_Name,
Project_Purpose,
Project_Description,
Create_Time,
Module_Description,
Invite_Code_1,

stage,

mapper.update:
update Project
Project_Name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Project_Purpose = #{projectPurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Project_Description = #{projectDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Create_Time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Module_Description = #{moduleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Invite_Code_1 = #{inviteCode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Invite_Code_2 = #{inviteCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Is_Default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT},
Is_End = #{isEnd,jdbcType=BIT},
Is_Userful = #{isUserful,jdbcType=BIT},
stage = #{stage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Project_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Project set Project_Name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Project_Purpose = #{projectPurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Project_Description = #{projectDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Create_Time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Module_Description = #{moduleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Invite_Code_1 = #{inviteCode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Invite_Code_2 = #{inviteCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Is_Default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT}, Is_End = #{isEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, Is_Userful = #{isUserful,jdbcType=BIT}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Project_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
